text:"This is top-level text"

text:"This is text that spans multiple lines.\n\n" text:"You can throw in some HTML markup if you want!"

text:"If you really want to you can change the block delimiter for the following\nreasons:\n- Avoid accidentally ending a block\n- To improve readability"

text:"This text will be in italics" text:"This text will be bold" text:"This is okay too" ${"$escapeXml(data.name)"} text:" some html - " text:"bold"
